formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Largest square from rectangle: If rectangle is \(w \times h\) (mm), largest square side \(s\) is: \[ s=\min(w,h),\quad \text{waste}=\max(w,h)-s \] Scale planner: Original paper side \(P_0\) yields model size \(M_0\). For a target model \(M_t\): \[ k=\frac{M_t}{M_0},\quad P_t=k\cdot P_0,\quad P_t' = P_t\,(1+m) \] where \(m\) is margin fraction (e.g., 0.03 for 3%). Stripe/Pleat: with usable width \(W\), margins \(L,R\), gap \(g\), stripes \(N\): \[ w=\frac{W-(L+R)-(N-1)\,g}{N} \] Diagonal & grid: for square side \(a\) and grid \(n\): \[ d=a\sqrt{2},\quad \Delta=\frac{a}{n} \]
